may not work well with this build script file. Please

fail.message: Failed to detect Java runtime library version used for building ICU4J

echo.message: The JDK version used by the current build environment
does not match the reference JDK version for this

target.name: initSrc
target.description: Run the preprocessor tool to modify Java sources for the Java runtime lib currently used.

target.name: normSrc
target.description: Run the preprocessor to normalize Java sources to the ICU source repository target JDK version

target.name: jdktzCheck
target.description: run icu4j test suite with JDK timezone

target.name: exhaustiveCheck
target.description: run standard icu4j test suite in exhaustive mode

target.name: noDataCheck
target.description: runs the tests when no data is present

echo.message: One of your targets requires JAVA_HOME to be set to JDK version 1.4 or newer

target.name: breakIterator
target.description: modular build of break iterator services

target.name: propertiesBasic
target.description: modular build of basic character properties

target.name: propertiesFull
target.description: modular build of full character properties

target.name: propertiesBasicTests
target.description: modular build of basic character properties

target.name: propertiesFullTests
target.description: modular build of full character properties

target.name: transliterator
target.description: modular build of unicode transform services

target.name: defaultPackage
target.description: Tests for loading resources in the default package

target.name: defaultPackageCheck
target.description: Run Tests for loading resources in the default package

target.name: initEclipseHome
target.description: Initialize the property eclipse.home from the environment variable ECLIPSE_HOME

target.name: initEclipseLauncher
target.description: Locate org.eclipse.equinox.launcher jar file for eclipse 3.3 and beyond

target.name: locateEclipsePDE
target.description: Locate org.eclipse.pde.build plug-in and set the property 'eclipse.pde.dir'

target.name: eclipseCoreProject
target.description: gather eclipse icu core project files

target.name: eclipseWrapperProject
target.description: gather eclipse icu core project files

target.name: eclipseTestProject
target.description: gather eclipse icu test project files

target.name: eclipseFragmentProject
target.description: gather eclipse icu fragment project files

target.name: icutzu
target.description: build ICU4J TimeZone Update Utility Classes

target.name: icutzujar
target.description: build ICU4J TimeZone Update Utility classes

echo.message: Please see ${tzu.bin.dir} directory for the files.

target.name: icutzucheck
